info: A grant of $15,000,000 is proposed for subprogram 2 of the Private Sector and Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises Development Program (PSME)—the second grant of a program cluster to build on support initiated under subprogram 1, approved by the Asian Development Bank (ADB) in September 2007. Subprogram 2 is to be provided as a single tranche, based on completed prior actions demonstrating satisfactory progress. The subprogram 2 focuses on implementing business climate reforms and SME institutional development. Subprogram 2 supports the Government’s efforts to improve trade policy capacity, especially as the Lao PDR increases its efforts preparing for WTO accession.
name: PRIVATE SECTOR AND SMALL&MED-SIZED ENTERPRISES DEV
